title: EDUCATION – Amends and adds to existing law to revise provisions regarding criminal history checks for school district employees and to establish provisions regarding a school chaplain policy.
subject: CRIMINAL BACKGROUND CHECKS
EDUCATION
RELIGION AND CHURCHES
SCHOOLS AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS
